Texto: 
small left apical pneumothorax, with a pigtail catheter positioned over the left apex.  on the right, a skin fold follows the thoracic contour, mimicking a larger pneumothorax.
pneumothorax and skin fold
bilateral pneumothorax
unilateral pneumothorax
64 y/o male inpatient, six days post left partial lobectomy
see factoid
